document.full_text: some research has found that people may be less likely to survive a heart attack if they are treated during hospital "off-hours." but a new study suggests that is not the case -- at least for people treated at larger medical centers well-equipped for handling heart attack victims.
document.title: heart attack treatment as good during off-hours?
lines_and_colors: some research has found that people may be less likely to survive a heart attack if they are treated during hospital "off-hours." but a new study suggests that is not the case -- at least for people treated at larger medical centers well-equipped for handling heart attack victims.
